Author: OriginalPainting
Text: dang you right, i think im gonna try accepting and saving for later. i hadnt even thought of that, and it seems a lot nicer than flat out declining. thank u!

Author: molotov-cocktail
Text: just cos they made food doesnt mean you owe it to them to consume it  it can feel bad disappointing people but people pleasing is chronic and super hard to curtail if you get into the habit.   could you possibly accept on the basis that you're not hungry right now, but you'll save it for later? and then either keep it till you can work it into your budget, give it to someone else (friend, coworker, etc) or discreetly dispose of it?  it sounds like an uncomfortable situation you're in, hope you figure something out
